content:
I've added a draft milestone planning to the document: https://hackmd.io/3eG6OZWHRbSMxoRxzwNhGQ?view#-Milestone-planning

Feedback/comments appreciated.

I'd move the "Final list of changes" earlier, to March.
Or alternatively there could be an explicit deadline for submitting change ideas at eg. the end of February. Two months should be plenty to collect the ideas people had over the last years, but comming to a decision and implementing them will take more time.
An early deadline for ideas would prevent hurrying to a decision.
I agree. Editions are not new so presumably many have already been thinking about this for ~2 years.
